Sales price,this lights will make your life lovely. NOTE: ONLY STRING LIGHTS, NOT COME WITH A CURTAIN, MAINLY USED FOR CURTAIN DECORATION. 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE! If for any reason you're not 100% SATISFIED, please let us know and our customer service team will help you RETURN OR REFUND.
body.description: How do we install our curtain lights? ◆ After receiving curtain string lights, you should install the battery, or the USB plug in the power with USB port (power bank, USB socket, computer, etc), press 8 button (“steady on” mode) on the remote control to check whether all light is on. The controller can be adjusted to the normal lighting mode. If the light is not on, please contact us. ◆ Secondly, open the main line and glue the main line to the place where you want to hang it. If you untangle each string of lights at once, they will become a tangle, and your brain will become a tangle. It will go crazy to arrange it. ◆ Finally, each branch should be disassembled in accordance with the order and let it fall down. LED curtain lights feature:◆ Compared to the traditional old lights, the new battery curtain lights come with a remote control, so you don't have to unplug all the time to switch off. Just remote control, aims at the battery box within 9.8ft/3m. ◆◆ Compared to traditional old lights with only one or few mode, there are many more modes that you can choose from, which are perfect for backdrop lights, Halloween or Christmas string lights. Specification> Color: Warm White String Lights Size: 9.8ft Width, 9.8ft Length LED Quantity: 300 LED Waterproof Level: IP 42 String Quantity: 10 Vertical Strands USB input voltage: 5 V DC What you will get? 9.8*9.8ft LED Curtain Lights, Remote Controller, USB Cable, Battery box, The instructions. Turn on the music and enjoy the romantic lights!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I honestly wasn’t expecting them to be as great as they are. They’re super long, have GREAT lighting, and the remote isn’t cheap!! For the price of two I thought they were gonna be janky but they’re actually awesome. It’s wonderful that they’re curly because it adds to the ambience. When they’re off during the day time the lights are shaped like water droplets so everything looks aesthetic still! I’ve had lights with remotes before but this remote actually works really well and fast. The settings are cool but I just prefer to have them on constant. They look GREAT with the wisteria flowers I have hanging up and they don’t produce heat so I can loop them throughout. Would totally buy again for the dorm! Btw I used the the small command strip holders for the part where the lights start and on the other side of my room I used gorilla putty and stuck the wire end to the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy setup, nice aesthetic.
reviews.reviewText: The setup for the lights was very very easy, and they are almost the perfect amount of brightness. Not too bright, not too dark. The different functions and modes are fun to mess around with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks fabulous. We have it behind some curtains and the yellow type gives the room a really cozy feel. Taking one star as one of the pairs stopped working after a couple of months (unlucky me) but Amazon had great customer service and resolved the issue. Make sure you read how to put them up, they can get tangled really easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really works exactly how I hoped. Just be patient un rolling each strand. Can get frustrating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved these lights
reviews.reviewText: I used them for halloween and strung them across the ceiling between the ceiling and a sheer gold curtain. I was a gypsy and made the entry way into a caravan they worked perfect for me

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It shines bright and it works but it could be made a little more durable and the strings that the lights are on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect lights to add magic to your life.
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly! I would definitely recommend hooking them up to your wall BEFORE you unwind each light string. I heard this advice before I set up my lights and it saved my life. I’ve had no issues with the lights; they’re bright, the remote works, and it has multiply different settings you can chose from (my favorite is the second setting). Super cute, perfect for any occasion from weddings to decorating your own room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Started to dim after 2 weeks
reviews.reviewText: These lights are so cute. Theyre very easy to put up, just make sure you don't unravel the lights until AFTER they've been hung. The remote is trash and the buttons don't match the settings listed in this listing nor the instructions that come with the lights. It also doesn't work very well. I got them to turn on using the remote but that's it. Thankfully there is a button on the usb cord that controls the lights so I tend to use that. Overall very happy with purchase and would buy againUPDATED REVIEW: Unfortunately these have started dimming after only 2 weeks. They barely shine anymore. :/ I wouldnt buy these again
